EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_HowImprovedMeasures_WP_Q218.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading How Improved Measures Optimize Mission Effectiveness
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the How Improved Measures Optimize Mission Effectiveness: Using Warfighter-Centric Design and a Modern Platform to Achieve First, Second, and Third Order Improvements white paper.
We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-how-improved-measures-optimize-mission-effectiveness]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
